Reviews.Title: Good for the features, not a knock-out.
Reviews.Author: Vivian Olkin "CrazyViv"
Reviews.Content: I use a Mac for most everything except for Quickbooks and particular real estate sites that require or work best on a PC. Using Parallels was painful so I decided to invest in an inexpensive PC to use along with my Mac, but one that could handle QB and anything else I wanted.  I asked my techie nephew to pick one out for me and this was it.  Great screen display.  Very good for what it is.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core  1.8 GHz (3 MB Cache)
6 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics 4000
Windows 8, 5.5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire V5-572-6463 15.6-inch Laptop (Polar Black)
